name: Codelogicx Technologies
description:
Codelogicx is an IT company specializing in current and emerging technologies. With strong technical foundation Codelogicx delivers cutting edge, cost effective web solutions to its clients. Founded by programmers, the company strongly encourages research and has a history of creating successful, profitable products for its clients.
Codelogicx started its operations in the Spring of 2013 with an initial focus on delivering quality and sophisticated internet solutions to both domestic and international clients at affordable prices. Extremely customer oriented, Codelogicx takes over clients' IT issues and builds solutions for them, while letting them focus on their business.
The driving force behind Codelogicx is constant innovation. With a small but technically very strong team, Codelogicx attempts to deliver a very high ROI. Currently, we specialize in providing web based solutions but plan to expand to other select areas of emerging technologies.
The company is fully bootstrapped, and is debt free since inception.
